Package worldofzuul

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Answer  
    Command
    Holds information regarding the command typed in by the user, the information is in two parts, the command word of the type CommandWord (an enum) and a second word of the type String.
    CommandWords
    This class is used to hold the handles to each CommandWord object (the enum)
    Conversation
    A new object of conversation gets created everytime a player meets an NPC This handles all of the question and answers the question has To create the conversation, you need to read the equivalent JSON file The creation of a conversation is done in the method "createWholeConversation" and therefore not in the constructor
    Dashboard  
    FileHandler  
    Game
    This class controls the flow of the game, it contains the while loop that keeps the game running even after a command has been issued, this recognizes the function each command has, and processes both words.
    Inventory
    Inventory - thats all (skriv mere)
    Items  
    Moon
    Holds all of the information regarding a moon, they don't have a position, because their UUID will get assigned to a planet
    MovementCalculator  
    NPC  
    Parser
    Used to take input from the user, and create a command using the usertyped words
    Planet
    Holds all of the information regarding planets
    Player
    Holds all of the information regarding the player Contains methods for accessing the players inventory
    Question  
    Room  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CommandWord
    An enum class.
